protein.specific_function: Induces apoptosis through a caspase dependent pathway. Reduces mitochondrial membrane potential

reference.reference_text: Xie Q, Lin T, Zhang Y, Zheng J, Bonanno JA: Molecular cloning and characterization of a human AIF-like gene with ability to induce apoptosis. J Biol Chem. 2005 May 20;280(20):19673-81. Epub 2005 Mar 11.
